=== Stable Release Updates ===

** Recent
*** Lucid images moved to -proposed on 1/11 see: Bug:699885
*** Maverick moved to -proposed on 1/11 see: Bug:697948

** Next 
*** Current Lucid SRU candidate expected to be kernel for 10.04.2
*** Karmic - validation in progress,  in general, karmic and earlier releases won't follow 2 week cadence and will rely on traditional community testing/burn in cycle unless resources available from testing teams. 
*** Updates to Hardy, Dapper will be worked on during 10.04.2 freeze cycle. 
*** Security - ??  not aware of any hot issues to force earlier at this point.
